channel.title: akiba on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in akiba on Barefoot Rob

item.title: lessons in Akiba
item.description: 17:33 Thursday 21 February 2019 JST Now I am headed to Akihabara for lesson with Mayumi and them.

item.title: last Akihabara lesson this year
item.description: 20:22 Thursday 20 December 2018 JST We had our last lesson of the year in Akihabara today. This is also Toshie’s last lesson so we had a party in her honor with all her favorite snack foods.

item.title: great lesson
item.description: ##20:23 Thursday 12 February 2015 JST## Such a nice lesson tonight! This was my first time to meet these students; they are three lovely women, two of whom are retired, one of whom does not have a computer nor TV! Wow! We laughed a lot and they asked lots of questions and tried lots of speaking; I need to learn from them! Also great: there are plenty of seats on the train on the way back.
